title: Shock in Colombo! Zimbabwe stun Aussies as Muzarabani, Bennett script T20 WC classic
description: Zimbabwe secured a significant upset in the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, defeating Australia by 23 runs. A composed batting effort led by Brian Bennett's unbeaten 64, followed by a dominant bowling display spearheaded by Blessing Muzarabani's 4/17, proved decisive. This victory, their second against Australia in the format, has dramatically opened up Group B.

Gold price today: How much 18K, 22K and 24K gold costs in your city? Check rates
description: Gold futures surged by Rs 1,044 to Rs 1,53,880 per 10 grams on Friday. This rise was fueled by traders establishing fresh positions in response to strong spot market demand. International gold futures also saw an increase, trading at USD 4,962 per ounce.

title: Lakhpati Didis, farmers & start-ups: Details of first files signed by PM Modi at new office
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi signed a series of files from his new office complex, Seva Teerth. He approved a series of decisions focusing on women, youth, farmers and vulnerable citizens. According to the government, the first decisions from Seva Teerth reflect a spirit of “Seva” and aim to touch every section of society.

title: Mafia don Mukhtar Ansari’s shooter Shoaib Kidwai shot dead in UP's Barabanki
description: A close associate of slain mafia don Mukhtar Ansari, Shoaib Kidwai alias Bobby, was shot dead in broad daylight in Barabanki. Motorcycle-borne assailants intercepted his car and fired over ten rounds. Police are scanning CCTV footage and have launched combing operations, suspecting gang rivalry as the motive.

description: A small act of wisdom, opting for 45 paise travel insurance, brought justice to Ravi Kumar Sharma.  Despite initial delays, the Bhopal Consumer Commission awarded his wife ₹10 lakh, plus interest and compensation, recognizing the incident as a valid travel accident.  Read to know how a 45 paise ticket helped change the family's fortune.

description: Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan stated that Jawaharlal Nehru recognized Tibet as part of China to foster a strong relationship, recalling the Panchsheel agreement. He emphasized that India must reconsider its perspective on Himalayan boundaries, particularly in Uttarakhand's middle sector, where the Himalayas have historically served as interaction zones.

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has inaugurated 'Seva Teerth', a new building complex housing the PMO, National Security Council Secretariat, and Cabinet Secretariat, alongside Kartavya Bhavan 1 and 2. This significant administrative overhaul consolidates key government functions into modern, efficient, and citizen-centric facilities, replacing colonial-era nomenclature with names reflecting public service and duty.

This strategically vital project, utilizing modern technology, aims to improve defense logistics and disaster response in the region.

title: Bike first, crowd next: Speeding car leaves trail of destruction in Lucknow— CCTV shows horror
description: A speeding car driven by a 21-year-old student ran over six pedestrians near Hanuman Temple in Lucknow's Banthra area, killing a six-year-old boy. The accused, Gaurav Singh, was arrested within hours based on CCTV footage after he attempted to flee the scene. The vehicle, registered in Kanpur, has been seized.

He also highlighted the difficulty umpires face in judging Tariq's action in real-time, advocating for better technology.

Mavericks vs Lakers injury report: Who’s playing, out and questionable
description: The Dallas Mavericks and Los Angeles Lakers face off with significant injury concerns impacting both teams. Key players like Cooper Flagg for Dallas and Luka Dončić and Deandre Ayton for the Lakers are sidelined. Despite absences, the Lakers, led by LeBron James, are favored at home, while Dallas aims to stay in the playoff hunt.

title: Bad Bunny, Kendall Jenner spark buzz after Super Bowl LX show
description: Supermodel and Bad Bunny's ex girlfriend, Kendall Jenner, was spotted at Super Bowl LX as the popular Grammy winner took the stage for his controversial record breaking performance at the halftime show. Soon after the show, rumors of the two rekindling their romance have sparked chaos. Amid this, a clip of two leaving in his luxurious car has sparked panic as many believe the two have got back together.

title: Marvel Rivals Season 6.5 release timings for all regions
description: Marvel Rivals gears up for its major mid-season update, Season 6.5, launching February 13, 2026. The highly anticipated addition is Elsa Bloodstone, the 47th playable hero and a new Duelist. This update also promises significant meta-shifting balance changes and a Valentine's Day celebration, enhancing the hero shooter experience for players worldwide.

title: After CEO asked employees to stop coding, Nvidia engineers get access to OpenAI's Codex
description: Nvidia has deployed OpenAI's Codex AI coding tool to all 30,000 engineers, marking a significant enterprise rollout. CEO Jensen Huang's mandate to automate tasks with AI is driving this adoption, with engineers praising the tool's ability to handle complex workflows and maintain context.

title: Clavicular reportedly avoids conviction as Arizona drops felony fake ID and drug charges
description: Arizona prosecutors dropped felony and misdemeanor charges against Clavicular after his Scottsdale arrest for allegedly using a fake ID. The Maricopa County Attorney’s Office said there was “no reasonable likelihood of conviction,” according to The New York Times. Clavicular, who streams on Kick, called the arrest “political persecution.” He remains a controversial online figure.

title: Lauren Kyle turns heads in Milan as Connor McDavid eyes opener
description: Connor McDavid and Team Canada have arrived in Milan for the 2026 Winter Olympics, beginning preparations for their opener against Czechia. McDavid skated on the top line in practice and shared candid remarks about the Olympic Village and adjusting to jet lag. Off the ice, Lauren Kyle’s Instagram posts offered fans a personal look at life in Milan, highlighting family support and national pride. Canada, led by captain Sidney Crosby, aims to build on last year’s international success as Olympic competition begins.
